sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { ChakraProvider, Box, Text, Link, VStack, Code, Button, Stack, FormControl, FormLabel, Grid, Input, Container, extendTheme, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; const colors = { op: { 900: '#A7C4D8', 800: '#356FB0', 700: '#336AAC', 600: '#5FBDF4', }, }; const theme = extendTheme({ colors }); function App() { return ( E-Mail Chapter ); } export default App;
